version_description:
Optimize user experience. Boys, you must have this app!  

Any suggestions and expectations can be sent to us through "setting page", we will try out best to meet your needs. Open CAMHOMME, be a better man!

Learn to how to selfie, upgrade your ability to attract girls. CAM HOMME, men must have!
1. [More Composition Template]
- The composition template support online download, and we have updated a lot of new templates this time.
2. [Online Filter Store]
- You can download more filters, light effect, attitude copy.
3. [Multi-face Recognition Processing]
- In the "contour modeling" function of the "portrait" module, you can deal with a number of different faces.
4. [4 New Men's Face Types]
- In addition to the previous "oval face" "heart-shaped face" "square face", but also added a "rectangular face" "diamond face" "round face" "angular face”.
- Each face also comes with related facial description and model instructions, go with friends and photo it. Use [multi-face recognition processing] to change the type of friends' faces.
5. [Picture Editing Processing Function Optimization]
- We have done a lot of efficiency and functional optimization for picture processing capabilities,
- Such as "face clean" function, the effect of optimization is more suitable for men,
- Filter processing speed is increased by 30%, face recognition speed and accuracy are increased by 40%
- We optimize the "High Light" and "Shadow" function of "Edit" module for the one-way positive adjustment to the two-way positive and negative adjustment, so that you are more free in the revision.
6. [Support Registration System]
- CAM HOMME also supports the registration system, and you can experience more of our upcoming service.
7. [BUG Fix and Experience Optimization]
- We have fixed all the known BUG and experience problems, and if you have encountered this problem before, please update to verify it. If not successfully repaired, please “Message us" for help. We will try our best to solve it!

- FIXED BUGS!!!!
- Recently updated
1. Support online download more composition template
2. Online filter store
3. Multi-face recognition processing
4. Four new men's face types
5. Picture editing processing function optimization
6. Support registration system

1.Fixed iPhoneX

2.Optimize facial cleansing and healthy skin tone

7.Highlight colors and shadow colors adjustments

8.Screenshot quick share feature

9.Support a quick preview of the composition

10.Support the transparency of attitudinal writing

-Optimize men's facial cleansing algorithm
-“Self-timer" and "High-definition camera" dual-mode switch
-Improve the efficiency of shooting
-Add photo blanking function, instantly enhance the force
-Add Filter / Light Effect / Attitude "Random" selection button to improve selection efficiency
-Fit iPhoneX full screen
-Enhance the efficiency of browsing composition challenge works
-Solved and optimized 16 user experience issues
Come to send New Year’s blessings to win the 8888 yuan Red Envelope!

My girlfriend no longer has to worry about my terrible selfie POSE.
“CAM HOMME” Guideline is here, man!
1. Added custom Guideline. Immediately get the same pose of celebrity
2. You can also record titbits when you take a picture
3. Improved efficiency of Guideline display
4. Added real-time face customization
5. Also optimized 666 User Experience. Believe it or not!
In this update, the short video shooting function “Shooting Video Script” pioneered by CAMHOMME team teaches you to shoot good-looking short music videos.

Optimized user experience.
Recently updated, the short video shooting function “Shooting Video Script” pioneered by CAMHOMME team teaches you to shoot good-looking short music videos.
